translation: Serenity, self-restraint, austerity, purity, forgiveness, and uprightness, as well as knowledge, realization, and belief in God, are the duties of Brahmanas, born of their own nature.
commentary: 18.42 Shamah serenity? Restraint: selfrestraint? Tapas austerity? Shaucham purity? Forgiveness forgiveness? Arjavam uprightness? Eve even? f and? Knowledge knowledge? Science realisation? Astikyam belief in God? Brahmakarma (are) the duties of Brahmanas? Svabhavajam born of nature.Commentary Sama is control of the mind. Dama is control of the senses. Serenity and self-restraint have already been explained in XVII.2.
